title: Black screen after clicking launch
body: after update to new client when i click launch its only appear black screen

replies.body:
This issue happens when there's an issue with your upgrade. You should be able to bypass this by using the steps below:

> * Go to **C:\Riot Games\League of Legends-AIR ONLY\RADS\system**
* Open *user.cfg* with notepad
* Change leagueClientOptIn = yes to leagueClientOptIn = no
* Save and launch League again

Let me know if this did the trick!
yes is did but now i cant do it cause new client is permanent now
